channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to know about Trump's finalists to replace Powell as Fed chair
item.description: With Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell's term coming to an end in May, the decision of who will become the world's most important central banker is ...

item.title: Food banks brace for 42 million without SNAP
item.description: Food banks are already seeing a surge as tens of millions of families prepare for their Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program benefits to freeze. ...

item.title: All the times Trump has promoted 2028 run with merch and rhetoric
item.description: While members of Congress have brushed off the possibility of President Trump running for a third term , his public comments are full of mixed message...

item.title: Trump underwent previously undisclosed MRI during Walter Reed visit
item.description: President Trump received an MRI scan during a recent trip to Walter Reed National Military Medical Center , he told reporters Monday. Why it matters: ...

item.title: Indiana Gov. Mike Braun calls special redistricting session
item.description: Indiana Gov. Mike Braun has called state lawmakers back to the Capitol for a special legislative session to redraw its congressional districts. Why it...

item.title: What’s Obama been up to?
item.description: Why Democrats are looking to a former president to weather the Trump storm.

item.title: Trump called Pence a ‘wimp’ before Jan. 6 attack, according to new notes

item.title: Largest federal workers union calls for ‘clean’ bill to end shutdown
item.description: The American Federation of Government Employees is calling for a stopgap funding measure to bring employees back to work with back pay.

item.title: Virginia Democrats kick off effort to create more blue congressional seats
item.description: A special session of the Virginia General Assembly starts Monday. It’s part of a nationwide redistricting race, with Indiana’s Republican governor cal...

item.title: Americans split along political lines over Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl pick
item.description: A Quinnipiac University poll shows Democrats overwhelmingly support the NFL’s pick for the halftime show while nearly as many Republicans oppose it.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
